agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent who handled the call.

call_charge.description: The cost or charge associated with the call.

call_group_id.description: The ID of the group associated with the call.

call_recording_consent.description: Indicates whether there is recording consent for the call.

call_recording_consent_action.description: The action taken based on recording consent.

call_recording_consent_keypress.description: Keypress used for call recording consent.

callback.description: Indicates if the call is a callback.

completion_status.description: Status indicating if the call was successfully completed.

consultation_time.description: Time spent on consultation during the call.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call was created.

customer_requested_voicemail.description: Indicates if the customer requested voicemail.

default_group.description: Default group associated with the call.

exceeded_queue_time.description: Indicates if the call exceeded queue waiting time.

hold_time.description: Time the caller spent on hold during the call.

ivr_action.description: Action taken by IVR during the call.

ivr_destination_group_name.description: Name of the IVR destination group.

ivr_hops.description: Number of times call was routed through IVR.

ivr_routed_to.description: Destination of the call after IVR routing.

ivr_time_spent.description: Time spent on IVR interactions during the call.

not_recording_time.description: Time when call was not being recorded.

outside_business_hours.description: Indicates if the call occurred outside business hours.

overflowed.description: Indicates if the call overflowed from a queue.

overflowed_to.description: Destination where the call overflowed to.

phone_number.description: Phone number associated with the call.

phone_number_id.description: ID of the phone number associated with the call.

quality_issues.description: Indicates any quality issues during the call.

recording_control_interactions.description: Interactions related to call recording control.

recording_time.description: Total time the call was recorded.

talk_time.description: Total talk time during the call.

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket associated with the call.

time_to_answer.description: Time taken to answer the call.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call data was last updated.

voicemail.description: Indicates if voicemail was left during the call.

wait_time.description: Total time the caller waited before the call was answered.

wrap_up_time.description: Time taken for wrap-up activities after the call.
